work.position: Senior Solutions Engineer (Western US Team Lead)
highlights: Orchestrate pre-sales activities for the development and implementation of complex solutions.
Evangelize the product: speaking at conferences, writing blogs and technical talks.
Participate in team coordination, development activities, project planning and recruitment.
Lead, mentor, and develop the teamâ€™s sales, technical, and business skills.
Develop and execute technical and business programs to maintain high levels of proficiency.
Execute PoCs and build systems with customers such as: Goldman Sachs, Pinterest, Uber, etc.
Define requirements and success criteria with customers.
Optimize schemas and queries, find bottlenecks, analyze hardware utilization and performance.
Design and deploy environments from PoC to production; automate operations.
Support the sales team on the technical side of the sale, build reusable sales optimization tools.
Translated design mockups and prototypes into large-scale web applications.
Owned internal projects, including: sales tools, demos, documentation, company website, testing infrastructure and cloud infrastructure.
Collaborated with support and end users to resolve any technical issues in the field.
